INVALID_SEMESTER_LEVELS: Invalid semester levels detected. A semester's level cannot exceed the maximum allowed.
INCOMPLETE_SEMESTER_DATA: Incomplete semester data. You must provide all semesters for each level.
EMPTY_SEMESTER: A semester cannot be empty. Each semester must have at least one course.
DUPLICATE_COURSES: Duplicate courses found within the plan. Each course should only appear once.
SEMESTER_PLAN_COURSE_IDS_ARRAY: Course IDs must be an array.
SEMESTER_PLAN_COURSE_IDS_UUID: Each course ID must be a valid UUID.
